00027 #ifndef MSQ_PATCH_SET_USER_HPP
00028 #define MSQ_PATCH_SET_USER_HPP
00029 
00030 
00031 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00032 #include "VertexPatches.hpp"
00033 #include "GlobalPatch.hpp"
00034 
00035 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00036 
00041 class PatchSetUser
00042 {
00043 public:
00044 
00045     PatchSetUser( bool defaultGlobal ) :
00046       myVertexPatches( 1, true )
00047       { 
00048         if(defaultGlobal)
00049           activePatchSet = &myGlobalPatch;
00050         else
00051           activePatchSet = &myVertexPatches; 
00052       }
00053     
00054     PatchSetUser( PatchSet* my_patch_set ) :
00055       myVertexPatches( 1, true ),
00056       activePatchSet( my_patch_set )
00057       {}
00058     
00059     virtual ~PatchSetUser();
00060       
00062     void use_global_patch() 
00063       { activePatchSet = &myGlobalPatch; }
00064     
00066     bool using_global_patch() const 
00067       { return activePatchSet == &myGlobalPatch; }
00068     
00073     void use_element_on_vertex_patch( unsigned num_layers = 1 )
00074       { 
00075         activePatchSet = &myVertexPatches;
00076         myVertexPatches.set_num_layers( num_layers );
00077       }
00078     
00080     bool using_element_on_vertex_patch() const
00081       { return activePatchSet == &myVertexPatches; }
00082     
00086     unsigned num_element_on_vertex_layers() const
00087       { return myVertexPatches.get_num_layers(); }
00088       
00089     virtual PatchSet* get_patch_set()
00090       { return activePatchSet; }
00091       
00092     void use_patch_set( PatchSet* patch_set )
00093       { activePatchSet = patch_set; }
00094 
00095 private:
00096 
00097     VertexPatches myVertexPatches;
00098     GlobalPatch   myGlobalPatch;
00099     PatchSet* activePatchSet;
00100 };

00104 } // namespace Mesquite
